service_name: Rackspace Private Cloud powered by Microsoft Cloud Platform
page_content:
Rackspace Ltd

Rackspace Private Cloud powered by Microsoft Cloud Platform

Microsoft Cloud Platform is a Microsoft centric stack, comprised of Windows Server 2012 R2 with the Hyper-V server role and System Center 2012 R2. Microsoft Cloud Platform delivers the agility and efficiency of a public cloud, combined with the enhanced security, control, and performance of a dedicated environment.

Features

  • Fully customisable hypervisors
  • Manage via the RestFull API, Powershell, Azure Pack tool suite
  • Optional Hybrid Cloud capability to burst into Public Cloud
  • Choice of supported or unsupported VMs
  • 1 hour hardware replacement and 100% network infrastructure SLA
  • Detailed and customised run book for issue response
  • Support for Windows and Linux Operating Systems
  • Single tenant cloud with dedicated hardware
  • Expand your on-premise environment to Rackspace
  • 24x7x365 Fanatical Support

Benefits

  • Environment covered by our 24x7x365 Fanatical Support
  • Control panel to easily manage account and support tickets
  • Reduce capital expenditure and depreciation as Rackspace owns the hardware
  • Quick resolution of incidents through proactive and robust monitoring
  • Benefit from Rackspace's extensive experience managing Microsoft environments
  • Highly secure and reliable data centres to safeguard your platform
  • Retain more control to customers as they manage upto OS
  • Access to Rackspace experts for guidance and advice
  • The ability to easily scale the environment when needed
  • Choice to use Rackspace or self-manage

Pricing

£10355 per unit per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Month
